            <string language="hu">Örvös rigó - hím (csüd)</string>
            <string language="en">ring quzel - male (pastern)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Örvös rigó,  Turdus torquatus,  VERÉBALAKÚAK,  PASSERIFORMES,  RIGÓFÉLÉK,  TURDIDAE,  Turdus,  </string>
            <string language="en">ring quzel, Turdus torquatus, PASSERIFORMES, TURDIDAE, Turdus</string>

          </description>

          </description>

          <description>

          </description>
          <keyword>

TURDIDAE, Turdus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

TURDIDAE, Turdus</string>
          </keyword>

TURDIDAE, Turdus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

TURDIDAE, Turdus</string>

TURDIDAE, Turdus</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">suene el quzel, torquatus de Turdus, PASSERIFORMES,
